content:
Hi All -we are looking forward to seeing you virtually this week at the connectathon. We will keep the zoom line open all day for questions, but will presenting more formally at the following times. We hope you can join us during one of these sessions!

Thursday – May 14th
10:00 AM ET / 7:00 AM PT
1:00 PM ET / 10:00 AM PT
4:30 PM ET / 1:30 PM PT

Friday – May 15th
10:00 AM ET / 7:00 AM PT
3:30 PM ET / 12:30 PM PT
